text: A yesli by My sdelali yego Koranom inoyazychnym, to oni skazali by: "Yesli by to byli izlozheny yasno yego stikhi!" Razve zhe inoyazychnyy i arabskiy! Skazhi: "On dlya tekh, kotoryye uverovali, - rukovodstvo i vrachevaniye; a te, kotoryye ne veruyut, v ushakh ikh glukhota, i on dlya nikh - slepota. Eto - te, k kotorym vzyvayut iz dalekogo mesta
